      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.utility.factory with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FailuresFactoryDefault.disable(Entity entity) 
      abstract void FailuresFactory.disable(Entity entity)
      Disables simulation of the failures/repairs for the given entity if enabled.
      void FailuresFactoryDefault.disableRec(Entity entity) 
      abstract void FailuresFactory.disableRec(Entity entity)
      Disables simulation of the failures/repairs for the given entity and all of its children if enabled.
      void FailuresFactoryDefault.enable(Entity entity) 
      abstract void FailuresFactory.enable(Entity entity)
      Enables simulation of the failures/repairs (if not already) for the given entity if FailureProneEntity.supportsFailureStateUpdate() returns true.
      void FailuresFactoryDefault.enableRec(Entity entity) 
      abstract void FailuresFactory.enableRec(Entity entity)
      Enables simulation of the failures/repairs (if not already) for the given entity and all of its children which extend FailureProneEntity and if FailureProneEntity.supportsFailureStateUpdate() returns true.
      static Switch FactoryUtils.generateSwitch(Config config, Entity parent)
      Generates and returns a new Switch.
      static Factory Factory.getFactory(Entity entity)
      Returns a factory instance created using the given entity's configuration
      FailuresFactory.FailureRepairEvent FailuresFactoryDefault.getFutureEvent(Entity entity) 
      abstract FailuresFactory.FailureRepairEvent FailuresFactory.getFutureEvent(Entity entity)
      Returns the next scheduled event for the entity for handling failures/repairs.

      This interface defines the strategy to use when a new ComputingOperation is being activated in order to select a ProcessingUnit among all available ones inside the VM.
      interface  TemporaryVirtualMachine
      Defines a virtual machine which is for temporary usage only.
      interface  VirtualMachine
      A VirtualMachine is a RunnableEntity that can have multiple jobs running inside of it.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PuAllocatorDefault
      The strategy employed is to choose the ProcessingUnit that gives a higher promise (ie: the less used PU).
      class  TemporaryVirtualMachineDefault 
      class  VirtualMachineDefault
      This implementation will only set parent for its VirtualRam when it is started.

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Operation<Resource>
      An operation is RunnableEntity that needs a certain amount of running time in order to be completed.

      This interface describes an Operation that has also a destination Job.
      interface  SynchronizableOperation<Resource>
      An operation that offers methods to easily synchronize it with other operations.

    • Uses of Entity in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner

      Subinterfaces of Entity in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Provisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource> 
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FairProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner ensures fair distribution of the available capacity through active operations.
      class  FastFairProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner gives promises that are equal to the average capacity computed by considering all active operations that use this provisioner.
      class  InfiniteProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner always give resource promises with a value of Long.MAX_VALUE.
      class  LongProvisionerImpl<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource> 
      class  StaticProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner gives promises that are equal to its current free capacity.
